# copy()

**Instance Method**

Returns a copy of the coordinate span.

## Declaration

```swift
copy(): CoordinateSpan;
```

## Return Value

A copy of the coordinate span.

## Copying and comparing spans

- **equals(anotherSpan)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two spans are equal.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two spans are equal.
items.name: equals(anotherSpan)
